name: Collector！
description:
Title: Collector! 

Platform: PC Game 

Genre: Platformer 

Rating: E 

Target Market: Ages 6+, casual gamers 

Game Overview: This is an interesting game, the game is simple to play but the level design is very challenging. This game doesn't take too long, so come and play.

 Instructions: The game uses W, S, A, D on the keyboard to move forward, backward, left, and right, then use space to jump and press TAB to open the menu.  The goal of this game is to collect all the pickups on the map.

Game Design Team 

Ruoyu Zhang – Game Designer
